enquiry.headline: Enquiry
enquiry.errorMessage: Your enquiry could not be sent.

about.headline: About us
about.description: <typography>We, Olaf and Tina, had long dreamed of emigrating to Spain. Olaf is half Spanish; his mother comes from the Murcia region. We have owned an apartment in Los Urrutias for years. In 2024, we took the plunge, sold everything in Germany and emigrated to Spain. We are self-employed here with a small German service business and now want to give others the opportunity to experience the flair and lifestyle of this area.</typography><typography>We love this country and want to inspire others to love it too. It is important to us that we, as landlords, are always on site and available as a point of contact. We handle the rental ourselves. For you as our tenant, this means that we carry out a final inspection (when the tenants leave) to ensure that you do not experience any unpleasant surprises on arrival and that the apartment is in perfect condition.</typography>

metadata.title: Holiday home Los Alcázares with pool | Mar Menor
metadata.description: Holiday home & apartment in Los Alcázares (Murcia) with sea view & pool. Ideal for beach holidays, relaxation & family vacations on the Spanish coast.
